Set your goal and step length from profile section then go to Track steps and start walking. Please keep your phone with you.
We will help you to set step goal according to your achieved steps to keep you motivated.
Pedometer work with the buils-in sensor. If you shake your phone, it might be counted as steps. It\'s not a bug. \n\nWe will working hard for your better user experience.
We will help you to set step size as different height having different step length.
We count your steps by using the built-in sensor in your phone, so the better the build-in sensor, the more accurate the step count.

Suggest: Put your phone in your hand, pocket, bag, armband or places close to your body. \n\nNot suggest: Put your phone away from your body; put your phone in places that shake too fast or places that have little movement.

In certain driving circumstances, it may count some steps due to system restrictions, which depends on the conditions you are driving in and where you place your phone. 

If this problem occurs, you may tap the PAUSE button to pause the step counter when you're taking a long drive.

We are continuously working on this issue and very sorry for any inconvenience caused.
